sentences.sContent: We strive to paddle to follow the stream, however, we are unsure if how and when we will reach the horizon.
sentences.sContent_eng: We strive to paddle to follow the stream, however, we are unsure if how and when we will reach the horizon.
sentences.sCn: 我们沿着河流奋力划桨，但是我们无法确定我们什么时候和怎样才能到达地平线。

sentences.sContent: I remembered being very careful never to rub my paddle against the gunwale for fear of disturbing the stillness of the cathedral.
sentences.sContent_eng: I remembered being very careful never to rub my paddle against the gunwale for fear of disturbing the stillness of the cathedral.
sentences.sCn: 我记得我划得非常小心，生怕那木桨和舷边磨擦的响声会打破了这圣地的宁静。

remMethod.val: pad(动物的肉趾， 如鸭蹼)+dle→利用鸭蹼划水的原理→桨

words.tran: 涉水者；明轮船桨手；乒乓球运动员

trans.tranOther: a short pole that is wide and flat at the end, used for moving a small boat in water
to move a small light boat through water, using one or more paddles
